* https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installing/

### info

```{sh}
which pip3
#/usr/local/bin/pip3

pip3 --version
#pip 24.0 from /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.12/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip (python 3.12)
```

### upgrade {#upgrade-pip}

```sh
pip3 install --upgrade pip
pip3 install -U pip
```

### help

```sh
pip3 help
```

## basics

### install/uninstall

```sh
pip3 install package-name
pip3 install package-name==1.0
pip3 install -U package-name # upgrade if already installed
pip3 uninstall package-name
```

### requirements {#requirements}

```sh
pip3 freeze # print requirements
pip3 freeze > requirements.txt # create a requirements.txt file with pkg==version
pip3 install -r requirements.txt # install from requirements.txt
pip3 install -U -r requirements.txt # install requirements.txt and upgrade packages (if possible)
```

### list

```sh
pip3 list # list all packages 
pip3 list --outdated # list all outdated packages 
```

### show

```sh
pip3 show package-name
```
